"The ability to specify a folder for saving files gamesIf you don't need a Russian voice acting, you can not download the file sound-rus catalyst, if not need 
English voice-can not download sound-eng catalyst."

What does this mean? Does this mean you cannot change language?

@theshop
I think it means that if you don't need Russian voice acting you don't need to download sound-rus.catalyst (642 MiB) file. Same goes for English voice acting (sound-eng.catalyst).

@prikosnoveni
ok, thank you for making it easier to understand.  I way they said it, it was very confusing.
